doc.field: Pacific War Trip - Aircraft Carrier "Yorktown" (4 folders)
Pacific War Trip - Aircraft Carrier "Yorktown" (4 folders)

Includes various photos of HRL and Henry Luce III aboard the ship on which Luce III was serving; various photos of HRL in military uniform standing in front of the illustration of the Naval Air Transportation Service symbol; and developed film from his trip to China? Most of the photographs were taken aboard the "Yorktown" where HRL spent a number of days and show various scenes of everyday life aboard the vessel and include a group shot with HRL standing in a life jacket; an autographed photo by HRL and Edward R Wiegorck?; HRL sitting in a cockpit of a plane; HRL crossing between ships on a span; an autographed photo of the pilot Gene Foucic?; and HRL standing next to Major McGee before his first jet ride.
